item.description:
Hi All

Karen Powers, Founder of Green Mountain Pug Rescue, will be attending this meet up so I would like everyone to make an effort to attend, to show her what a great meet up group we have.

Please note the later time, and that it wil be held at Patty's house, as she has a shadier back yard for the pugs.

Thanks

Marie

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: The Manchester Pug July Meetup
